effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the user was not yet hit by an opponent’s physical move this turn, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the user was not yet hit by an opponent’s physical move this turn, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the user was not yet hit by an opponent’s physical move this turn, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.
